description.tagline: Professional Event Booking & Accommodation Management System
description.short_description: Streamlined booking experience for events and accommodations with secure Stripe payments and comprehensive utilities.
description.long_description: AIOHM Booking Pro is the ultimate WordPress solution for managing event bookings and accommodation reservations. From individual rooms to entire properties, from tickets to complex events, this plugin handles it all with enterprise-grade security, AI-powered analytics, and seamless payment integration.
description.key_value_proposition: Transform your WordPress site into a professional booking platform in minutes, not months.

accommodation_management.title: Advanced Accommodation Management
accommodation_management.description: Comprehensive system for managing any type of accommodation

features.name: Multiple Accommodation Types
features.description: Support for 12+ property types: rooms, houses, apartments, villas, bungalows, cabins, cottages, suites, studios, units, spaces, venues
features.user_benefit: Flexibility to manage any type of property or space
features.technical_detail: Dynamic accommodation type system with customizable labels

features.name: Dynamic Property Creation
features.description: Automatically create and manage up to 50 accommodations with one-click
features.user_benefit: Scale from 1 to 50 properties effortlessly
features.technical_detail: Automated post generation with proper meta data and numbering

features.name: Individual Property Customization
features.description: Unique titles, descriptions, pricing for each accommodation
features.user_benefit: Personalize each property to maximize bookings
features.technical_detail: Custom post type with flexible meta field system

features.name: Smart Pricing System
features.description: Standard and early bird pricing with percentage-based deposits
features.user_benefit: Maximize revenue with dynamic pricing strategies
features.technical_detail: Flexible pricing engine with deposit calculation

features.name: Real-time Availability
features.description: Live availability tracking with occupancy statistics
features.user_benefit: Always know your occupancy status at a glance
features.technical_detail: Cached availability system with performance optimization

booking_system.title: Professional Booking Engine
booking_system.description: Full-featured booking system with calendar integration

features.name: Interactive Calendar
features.description: Visual booking calendar with drag-drop functionality
features.user_benefit: Intuitive booking management that saves time
features.technical_detail: AJAX-powered calendar with real-time updates

features.name: Guest Management
features.description: Comprehensive guest profiles with contact information
features.user_benefit: Build relationships with returning customers
features.technical_detail: Structured guest data with booking history

features.name: Booking Status Tracking
features.description: Multiple booking states: pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed
features.user_benefit: Clear booking pipeline management
features.technical_detail: State machine with automated status transitions

features.name: Flexible Check-in/Check-out
features.description: Customizable arrival and departure times
features.user_benefit: Accommodate different guest needs
features.technical_detail: Time-based availability system

ai_analytics.title: AI-Powered Business Intelligence
ai_analytics.description: Advanced analytics with multiple AI provider integrations

features.name: Multi-Provider AI Support
features.description: Integration with OpenAI, Google Gemini, ShareAI, and local Ollama
features.user_benefit: Choose the AI service that fits your budget and needs
features.technical_detail: Modular AI provider system with fallback support

features.name: Smart Business Insights
features.description: AI analysis of booking patterns, revenue trends, and occupancy rates
features.user_benefit: Make data-driven decisions to grow your business
features.technical_detail: Natural language processing of booking data

features.name: Interactive Query System
features.description: Ask questions about your bookings in plain English
features.user_benefit: Get instant answers without complex reports
features.technical_detail: NLP query processing with contextual responses

features.name: Predictive Analytics
features.description: AI-powered forecasting for occupancy and revenue
features.user_benefit: Plan ahead with confidence
features.technical_detail: Machine learning algorithms for trend analysis

features.name: Example Questions Library
features.description: Pre-built queries for common business questions
features.user_benefit: Get started immediately with proven insights
features.technical_detail: Curated prompt templates with dynamic data injection

payment_processing.title: Secure Payment Integration
payment_processing.description: Professional payment processing with Stripe integration

features.name: Stripe Integration
features.description: Full Stripe payment processing with SCA compliance
features.user_benefit: Accept payments securely from customers worldwide
features.technical_detail: Stripe Elements with 3D Secure authentication

features.name: Deposit Management
features.description: Flexible deposit percentages with automatic calculation
features.user_benefit: Secure bookings with partial payments
features.technical_detail: Percentage-based deposit system with rounding

features.name: Payment Status Tracking
features.description: Complete payment lifecycle management
features.user_benefit: Never lose track of payment status
features.technical_detail: Payment state machine with webhook handling

features.name: Refund Management
features.description: Automated refund processing through Stripe
features.user_benefit: Handle cancellations professionally
features.technical_detail: API-integrated refund system

notifications.title: Smart Notification System
notifications.description: Automated email notifications with customizable templates

features.name: Automated Email Sequences
features.description: Booking confirmations, reminders, and updates
features.user_benefit: Professional communication without manual work
features.technical_detail: Template-based email system with merge fields

features.name: Customizable Templates
features.description: Branded email templates with dynamic content
features.user_benefit: Maintain brand consistency in all communications
features.technical_detail: HTML email templates with CSS styling

features.name: Multi-trigger System
features.description: Notifications for bookings, payments, cancellations
features.user_benefit: Keep guests informed at every step
features.technical_detail: Event-driven notification system

features.name: Admin Notifications
features.description: Get notified of new bookings and important events
features.user_benefit: Stay on top of your business
features.technical_detail: Administrator alert system with email delivery

event_management.title: Advanced Event & Ticket Management
event_management.description: Complete event management with ticketing system

features.name: Event Creation & Management
features.description: Create and manage events with detailed information
features.user_benefit: Organize events alongside accommodation bookings
features.technical_detail: Event custom post type with meta fields

features.name: Ticket Categories
features.description: Multiple ticket types with different pricing
features.user_benefit: Flexible ticketing for different guest types
features.technical_detail: Ticket taxonomy with pricing meta

features.name: Capacity Management
features.description: Set and track event capacity limits
features.user_benefit: Never oversell your events
features.technical_detail: Real-time capacity tracking with booking limits

features.name: Event Calendar Integration
features.description: Events appear alongside accommodation bookings
features.user_benefit: Unified view of all bookings
features.technical_detail: Integrated calendar system with event overlay

roi_benefits: Save 10+ hours per week on admin tasks
Reduce no-shows by 50% with automated reminders

unique_selling_points.description: Handle unlimited properties with individual customization

unique_selling_points.description: Modular system with extensive hooks and filters

Handles thousands of bookings without slowdown
